properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 3:52PM EST until January 7 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 4 to 6 feet expected. For the
Gale Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 40 kt
and seas 7 to 10 feet possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to
1 PM EST Tuesday. For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday afternoon
through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
